Pane.title: Check Compatibility
Pane.Body:
Windows 11 Compatibility Check

The CPU must support POPCNT and SSE4.2 as of v24H2. Without that support, the system will fail to boot.

Please check the below to see if the current device can run Windows 11 24H2+.

Unknown

NOTE: The above checks are to be used as a guide ONLY, and do not ensure full compatibility nor guarantee support from either Microsoft or the Department.
